sources.../src/clone-svg.ts:
const cloneSvg = (sourceSvg: SVGElement) =>
  sourceSvg.cloneNode(true) as SVGElement

export default cloneSvg
sources.../src/is-local.ts:
const isLocal = () => window.location.protocol === 'file:'

export default isLocal
sources.../src/svg-cache.ts:
const svgCache = new Map<string, SVGElement | Error | undefined>()

export default svgCache
sources.../src/unique-id.ts:
let idCounter = 0
const uniqueId = () => ++idCounter
export default uniqueId
